name: sid
description: set rule ID

name: priority
description: rules with a higher priority will be examined first

name: rev
description: set version of the rule

name: classtype
description: information about the classification of rules and alerts

name: app-layer-protocol
description: match on the detected app-layer protocol

name: tcp.ack
description: check for a specific TCP acknowledgement number

name: tcp.seq
description: check for a specific TCP sequence number

name: tcp.window
description: check for a specific TCP window size

name: ipopts
description: check if a specific IP option is set

name: tcp.flags
description: detect which flags are set in the TCP header

name: fragbits
description: check if the fragmentation and reserved bits are set in the IP header

name: fragoffset
description: match on specific decimal values of the IP fragment offset field

name: ttl
description: check for a specific IP time-to-live value

name: tos
description: match on specific decimal values of the IP header TOS field

name: itype
description: match on a specific ICMP type

name: icode
description: match on specific ICMP id-value

name: icmp_id
description: check for a ICMP ID

name: icmp_seq
description: check for a ICMP sequence number

name: icmpv4.hdr
description: sticky buffer to match on the ICMP v4 header

name: dsize
description: match on the size of the packet payload

name: flow
description: match on direction and state of the flow

name: threshold
description: control the rule's alert frequency

name: metadata
description: used for logging

name: reference
description: direct to places where information about the rule can be found

name: msg
description: information about the rule and the possible alert

name: content
description: match on payload content

name: uricontent
description: legacy keyword to match on the request URI buffer

name: pcre
description: match on regular expression

name: depth
description: designate how many bytes from the beginning of the payload will be checked

name: startswith
description: pattern must be at the start of a buffer (same as 'depth:<pattern len>')

name: endswith
description: make sure the previous content matches exactly at the end of the buffer

name: distance
description: indicates a relation between this content keyword and the content preceding it

name: within
description: indicate that this content match has to be within a certain distance of the previous content keyword match

name: offset
description: designate from which byte in the payload will be checked to find a match

name: replace
description: only to be used in IPS-mode. Change the following content into another

name: nocase
description: modify content match to be case insensitive

name: fast_pattern
description: force using preceding content in the multi pattern matcher

name: byte_test
description: extract <num of bytes> and perform an operation selected with <operator> against the value in <test value> at a particular <offset>

name: byte_jump
description: allow the ability to select a <num of bytes> from an <offset> and move the detection pointer to that position

name: sameip
description: check if the IP address of the source is the same as the IP address of the destination

name: geoip
description: keyword to match on country of src and or dst IP

name: ip_proto
description: match on the IP protocol in the packet-header

name: ftpbounce
description: detect FTP bounce attacks

name: isdataat
description: check if there is still data at a specific part of the payload

name: id
description: match on a specific IP ID value

name: rpc
description: match RPC procedure numbers and RPC version

name: flowint
description: operate on a per-flow integer

name: noalert
description: no alert will be generated by the rule

name: flowbits
description: operate on flow flag

name: hostbits
description: operate on host flag

name: stream_size
description: match on amount of bytes of a stream

name: detection_filter
description: alert on every match after a threshold has been reached

name: dataset
description: match sticky buffer against datasets (experimental)

name: datarep
description: operate on datasets (experimental)

name: decode-event
features: compatible with decoder event only rule

name: gid
description: give different groups of signatures another id value

name: bsize
description: match on the length of a buffer

name: tls.version
description: match on TLS/SSL version

name: tls.subject
description: match TLS/SSL certificate Subject field

name: tls.issuerdn
description: match TLS/SSL certificate IssuerDN field

name: tls_cert_notbefore
description: match TLS certificate notBefore field

name: tls_cert_notafter
description: match TLS certificate notAfter field

name: tls_cert_expired
description: match expired TLS certificates

name: tls_cert_valid
description: match valid TLS certificates

name: tls.fingerprint
description: match TLS/SSL certificate SHA1 fingerprint

name: tls_store
description: store TLS/SSL certificate on disk

name: http_cookie
description: content modifier to match only on the HTTP cookie-buffer

name: http.cookie
description: sticky buffer to match on the HTTP Cookie/Set-Cookie buffers

name: http_method
description: content modifier to match only on the HTTP method-buffer

name: http.method
description: sticky buffer to match specifically and only on the HTTP method buffer

name: http.protocol
description: http_protocol sticky buffer

name: http.start
description: http_start sticky buffer

name: urilen
description: match on the length of the HTTP uri

name: http_client_body
description: content modifier to match only on HTTP request-body

name: http.request_body
description: sticky buffer to match the HTTP request body buffer

name: http_server_body
description: content modifier to match on the HTTP response-body

name: http.response_body
description: sticky buffer to match the HTTP response body buffer

name: http_header
description: content modifier to match only on the HTTP header-buffer

name: http.header
description: sticky buffer to match on the normalized HTTP header-buffer

name: http.header_names
description: http_header_names sticky buffer

name: http.accept

name: http.accept_lang

name: http.accept_enc

name: http.connection

name: http.content_len

name: http.content_type

name: http.location
description: http.location sticky buffer for the http location header

name: http.server
description: http.server sticky buffer for the http server header

name: http.referer

name: http_raw_header
description: content modifier to match the raw HTTP header buffer

name: http.header.raw
description: sticky buffer to match the raw HTTP header buffer

name: http_uri
description: content modifier to match specifically and only on the HTTP uri-buffer

name: http.uri
description: sticky buffer to match specifically and only on the normalized HTTP URI buffer

name: http.uri.raw
description: sticky buffer to match specifically and only on the raw HTTP URI buffer

name: http_raw_uri
description: content modifier to match on the raw HTTP uri

name: http_stat_msg
description: content modifier to match on HTTP stat-msg-buffer

name: http.stat_msg
description: sticky buffer to match on the HTTP response status message

name: http_stat_code
description: content modifier to match only on HTTP stat-code-buffer

name: http.stat_code
description: sticky buffer to match only on HTTP stat-code-buffer

name: http_user_agent
description: content modifier to match only on the HTTP User-Agent header

name: http.user_agent
description: sticky buffer to match specifically and only on the HTTP User Agent buffer

name: http_host
description: content modifier to match on the HTTP hostname

name: http.host
description: sticky buffer to match on the HTTP Host buffer

name: http_raw_host
description: content modifier to match on the HTTP host header or the raw hostname from the HTTP uri

name: http.host.raw
description: sticky buffer to match on the HTTP host header or the raw hostname from the HTTP uri

name: http.request_line
description: sticky buffer to match on the HTTP request line

name: http.response_line
description: content modifier to match only on the HTTP response line

name: nfs_procedure
description: match NFS procedure

name: nfs.version
description: match NFS version

description: ssh.proto sticky buffer

description: match SSH software string

description: ssh.hassh.server sticky buffer

description: ssh.hassh.string sticky buffer

description: ssh.hassh.server.string sticky buffer

name: ssl_version
description: match version of SSL/TLS record

name: ssl_state
description: match the state of the SSL connection

name: byte_extract
description: extract <num of bytes> at a particular <offset> and store it in <var_name>

name: file.data
description: make content keywords match on file data

name: app-layer-event
description: match on events generated by the App Layer Parsers and the protocol detection engine

description: match on HTTP2 error code field

description: match on HTTP2 window update size increment field

description: match on HTTP2 dynamic headers table size update

name: http2.settings
description: match on HTTP2 settings identifier and value fields

description: sticky buffer to match on one HTTP2 header name and value

name: smb.named_pipe
description: sticky buffer to match on SMB named pipe in tree connect

description: sticky buffer to match on SMB share name in tree connect

name: filename

description: Match the DNS header opcode flag.
